description:
Izumi Chikage is a female student of class B. She is rather tomboyish and has a very friendly disposition, so she was the first student to talk to Akatsuki and Miu when they entered Babel. After the gym storehouse incident with Akatsuki, Miu, and Kuzuha, they all became very good friends. She is also a lesbian and is not ashamed to admit it, having a liking for cute girls such as Miu.
She has the ability to use water magic, and her AD takes the form of a bow.
name: Izumi Chikage
